attacks.name: Chuck Away
attacks.effect: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. This attack does 40 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Hyper Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Item Maniac-GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 6 Item cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
